# Cloak of Displacement, Major
## Overview
**Aura** moderate illusion; **CL** 7th

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 50,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This item appears to be a normal cloak, but on command its magical properties distort and warp light waves. This displacement works just like the *[[Displacement (Spell)|displacement]]* spell and lasts for a total of 15 rounds per day, which the wearer can divide up as she sees fit.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Extend Spell (Feat)|Extend Spell]], *[[Displacement (Spell)|displacement]]*;

**Cost** 25,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 506
